casebody.data:
In re ZEN T. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 21, 2016.

Heather S., self-represented, in support of the petition.

Michael Besso, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petition by the respondent mother for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 245, 138 A.3d 469 (2016), is denied.

ESPINOSA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
